column5: This is the latest must have computer hardware. You can forget that old school computer mouse, this thing can generate random key strokes faster then a three year old and beleave it or not it only costs peanuts (lots of peanuts though)  Meet Alvin the computer chimpmunk.
Must be fast too.... It's got racing stripes!  Burt
Don't do it it is a trap I almost lost a finger to the new and improved Squirrel mouse.   Art
